sentences.sContent: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
sentences.sCn: 曼宁希望以尽可能低的价格买到有价值的艺术品。

sentences.sContent: She has acquired an email address and a site on the World Wide Web.
sentences.sCn: 她获得了一个电子邮件地址和万维网网址。

remMethod.val: ac+quir(追求)+e→吾将上下而求索→取得， 获得； 学到

words.tran: [医] 后天的；已获得的；已成习惯的

trans.tranOther: to obtain something by buying it or being given it
